thread.title: Hanover Community Bank Names Denise Chardavoyne as Executive Vice President & Chief Retail and Information Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Hanover Community Bank Names Denise Chardavoyne as Executive Vice President & Chief Retail and Information Officer
text:
MINEOLA, N.Y., May 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hanover Community Bank today announced that Denise Chardavoyne has joined the Company as Executive Vice President & Chief Retail and Information Officer.
Ms. Chardavoyne brings to Hanover extensive expertise in all facets of Information Technology, Operations, and Retail Banking. At Hanover, Ms. Chardavoyne will be responsible for the strategic planning and implementation of Information Technology, Retail Banking, and Operational initiatives that align with Hanover’s corporate objectives. Ms. Chardavoyne will also be responsible for driving retail business development through the implementation of a sales culture throughout Hanover’s branch network, as well as assisting in the identification, procurement and opening of future retail branch locations. Prior to joining Hanover, Ms. Chardavoyne served as Executive Vice President and Chief Information Officer of Amalgamated Bank, Chief Information Officer at Suffolk County National Bank and Senior Vice President and Director of Deployment for Citibank N.A., where she led a key deployment initiative that drove global modernization and technology expansion across 1000+ branches. Ms. Chardavoyne obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Computer Science/Mathematics from Hofstra University.
